h2_title: Stone Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang
content: Defeating the Stone Vanguard will reward you with the Sterness of Stone, one half of the items you need to activate the tallies that unlock the large door to the chapter’s main boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stone_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Stone Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating the Stone Vanguard will reward you with the Sterness of Stone, one half of the items you need to activate the tallies that unlock the large door to the chapter’s main boss.
